unnormalised: **Energy & Utilities: Gas Cylinder Prices Giving Us Diwali Shocks!**
normalised: **Energy and Utilities: Gas Cylinder Prices Giving Us Diwali Shocks!**

unnormalised: Oi, folks! Looks like our Diwali mithai might be a little less sweet this year. Gas cylinder prices are up again, and your pocket's gonna feel the pinch.
normalised: Oi, folks! Looks like our Diwali mithai might be a little less sweet this year. Gas cylinder prices are up again, and your pocket is going to feel the pinch.

unnormalised: Bharat Petroleum just announced another hike, adding Rs. 50 to the already hefty cost of a cooking gas cylinder. That's like, two extra packets of Soan Papdi we can't buy now!
normalised: Bharat Petroleum just announced another hike, adding rupees fifty to the already hefty cost of a cooking gas cylinder. That is like, two extra packets of Soan Papdi we can not buy now!

unnormalised: Delhiites are already complaining, with many saying their monthly budget is going for a toss. Meena Aunty from Karol Bagh says she's considering going back to using a chulha (just kidding… maybe!).
normalised: Delhiites are already complaining, with many saying their monthly budget is going for a toss. Meena Aunty from Karol Bagh says she is considering going back to using a chulha (just kidding… maybe!).

unnormalised: Analysts are blaming international market fluctuations and some new tax Dr. Sharma mentioned. Whatever the reason, it's burning a hole in our savings.
normalised: Analysts are blaming international market fluctuations and some new tax Doctor Sharma mentioned. Whatever the reason, it is burning a hole in our savings.

unnormalised: Remember when we used to crib about petrol prices? Seems like cooking gas is the new villain! And with winter coming, we'll be needing all that chai and pakoras!
normalised: Remember when we used to crib about petrol prices? Seems like cooking gas is the new villain! And with winter coming, we will be needing all that chai and pakoras!

unnormalised: Experts recommend checking for subsidies; maybe you can get a little relief. Every sq ft of your home matters when you are running a family.
normalised: Experts recommend checking for subsidies; maybe you can get a little relief. Every square foot of your home matters when you are running a family.

unnormalised: Seriously though, someone needs to tell these gas companies to chill. Our pockets are already feeling the festival rush. Diwali Bonus kahan gaya?
normalised: Seriously though, someone needs to tell these gas companies to chill. Our pockets are already feeling the festival rush. Diwali Bonus kahan gaya?
